trans-unit.source: The SelectingProviderEventArgs class supplies values to the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event handler.
trans-unit.target: SelectingProviderEventArgs 類別可以提供值給<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider>事件處理常式。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider>

trans-unit.source: You create a <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event handler to select the role provider at run time.
trans-unit.target: 您建立<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider>事件處理常式，以在執行階段選取的角色提供者。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService> class raises the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event when either the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.IsCurrentUserInRole%2A> method or the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.GetRolesForCurrentUser%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService> class is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService>類別所引發<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider>事件時請<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.IsCurrentUserInRole%2A>方法或<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.GetRolesForCurrentUser%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService>類別稱為 「。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.GetRolesForCurrentUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.IsCurrentUserInRole%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService>

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.User%2A> property to retrieve information about the logged-in user.
trans-unit.target: 您使用<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.User%2A>屬性，以擷取已登入之使用者的相關資訊。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve role information through a non-default role provider, set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.ProviderName%2A> property to the name of the role provider that you want the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService> object to use.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取角色資訊透過非預設角色提供者，請設定<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.ProviderName%2A>屬性設為您想要的角色提供者名稱<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService>要使用的物件。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.ProviderName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the role provider to use for retrieving the user's roles.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用來擷取使用者角色的角色提供者。

trans-unit.source: You use the ProviderName property to set the role provider during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event.
trans-unit.target: 您使用的 ProviderName 屬性來設定角色提供者期間<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider>事件。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider>

trans-unit.source: The name of the role provider that is used to get the user's roles.
trans-unit.target: 用來取得使用者的角色的角色提供者名稱。

trans-unit.source: You use the User property to retrieve information about the user during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event.
trans-unit.target: 您使用的使用者屬性擷取期間的使用者資訊<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider>事件。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含已驗證的使用者。
